name: help2man
description:
help2man produces simple manual pages from the '--help' and '--version'
output of other commands.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: libtool
dependent_to.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: couchdb
dependent_to.description:
A CouchDB server hosts named databases, which store documents. Each
document is uniquely named in the database, and CouchDB provides a
RESTful HTTP API for reading and updating (add, edit, delete) database
documents.

dependent_to.name: debugedit
dependent_to.description:
Debugedit is a set of libraries and programs for creating and editing
debuginfo. It allows you to get build-ids and rewrite DWARF source
paths. Debugedit was originally part of the rpm project, and now exists
as its own separate project and is maintained by RedHat.

dependent_to.name: pnmpi
dependent_to.description:
PnMPI is a dynamic MPI tool infrastructure that builds on top of the
standardized PMPI interface.

dependent_to.name: flex
dependent_to.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependent_to.name: nauty
dependent_to.description:
nauty and Traces are programs for computing automorphism groups of
graphsq and digraphs
